佛像.definition: Buddhist image; statue of Buddha or Bodhisattva; CL:尊[zun1], 張|张[zhang1]

佛光.definition: Buddha's teachings; aura (around the head of Buddha)

佛口蛇心.definition: words of a Buddha, heart of a snake (idiom); two-faced; malicious and duplicitous

佛坪.definition: Foping County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi

佛坪縣.definition: Foping County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi

佛媛.definition: Buddhist griftress (female Internet influencer who exploits Buddhist imagery for self-promotion or commercial purposes)

佛山市.definition: Foshan, prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3dong1 Sheng3]

佛岡.definition: Fogang county in Qingyuan 清遠|清远[Qing1 yuan3], Guangdong

佛岡縣.definition: Fogang county in Qingyuan 清遠|清远[Qing1 yuan3], Guangdong

佛心.definition: Buddha-like heart (full of compassion); spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)

佛朗哥.definition: Franco (name); Generalissimo Francisco Franco Bahamonde (1892-1975), Spanish dictator and head of state 1939-1975

佛朗機炮.definition: Western (or Western-style) cannon of the Ming era

佛朗機銃.definition: Western (and so styled) cannon of the Ming era

佛法.definition: Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha); Buddhist doctrine

佛法僧目.definition: Coraciiformes, class of birds including kingfishers and hornbills

佛洛伊德.definition: Floyd (name); Freud (name); Dr Sigmund Freud (1856-1939), the founder of psychoanalysis

佛爺.definition: Buddha (term of respect for Sakyamuni 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2]); His Holiness (refers to a Buddhist grandee); Buddha; God; emperor; in late Qing court, refers exclusively to Empress Dowager Cixi 慈禧太后[Ci2 xi3 tai4 hou4]

佛祖.definition: Buddha; founder of a buddhist sect

佛系.definition: (neologism c. 2017) (coll.) chill about everything (typically used to describe young people who don't buy into aspirational society)

佛蘭德.definition: of or relating to Flemish people, language or culture

佛號.definition: one of the many names of Buddha

佛誕日.definition: Buddha's Birthday (8th day of the 4th Lunar month)

佛跳牆.definition: lit. Buddha jumps over the wall, name for a Chinese dish that uses many non-vegetarian ingredients

佛陀.definition: Buddha (a person who has attained Buddhahood, or specifically Siddhartha Gautama)

佛香閣.definition: Tower of Buddhist Incense in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing

佛龕.definition: niche for statue (esp. Buddhist, Christian etc)
